title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 1, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of Maria Mitchell, born in 1818. A devoted anti-slavery activist and suffragette, she became the first acknowledged female astronomer.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Maria Mitchell, born in 1818. A devoted anti-slavery activist and suffragette, she became the first acknowledged female astronomer.
